"""
We need to adjust the placement of the chest to avoid overlap with the mining drill.
Let's add proper spacing and try again.
"""

# Find and move to nearest iron patch
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)

# Craft a burner mining drill with our materials
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, quantity=1)

# Place the drill on the iron patch
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos)

# Add fuel to the drill
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

# Get some iron plates from our furnaces
for furnace in get_entities([Prototype.StoneFurnace]):
    if inspect_inventory(furnace).get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) > 0:
        extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=20)

# Craft an iron chest
craft_item(Prototype.IronChest, quantity=1)

# Place the chest next to the drill with increased spacing
chest = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.IronChest,
    reference_position=drill.position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT,
    spacing=2  # Add spacing to avoid overlap
)

print("Mining automation setup complete. Current inventory:")
print(inspect_inventory())
print("\nEntities on map:")
print(get_entities())

# Check if drill is working
sleep(5)  # Wait a bit for the drill to work
print("\nChecking drill contents:")
print(inspect_inventory(drill))
